Title: The Dawnbreaker: The Christening
Description:
The flagship of the Arathi armada is the Dawnbreaker. She is a marvel of Arathi engineering and faith in the Sacred Flame. Her presence in the Hallowfall sky will help us push back the nerubians when next they dare launch another assault on our lands.

As someone who has helped us so much in the past, you are cordially invited to the christening ceremony of the Dawnbreaker. If you could make sure it goes off without a hitch, you will have my personal gratitude.
ObjectivesText: Help the christening ceremony in the Dawnbreaker dungeon succeed.
CompletionText: The Dawnbreaker will cause problems for the nerubians once she is active. It is very important everything goes off without a hitch.
RewardText:
Well.

That went as well as could be expected for a ceremony in Hallowfall.

Thank you for being here.
